com.drellem.bf
Class ASTree

java.lang.Object
  com.drellem.bf.ASTree

public class ASTree
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the abstract syntax tree. This is essentially the same as TokenStream except that loop nodes contain their respective nodes. With tokens "Plus,Loop,Plus,End" the equivalent tree would look like "Plus,Loop[Plus]" and going from node to node would look like "Plus,Loop"
